I hope we get a CEO with the strength of the CEOs from $TSLA, $AAPL or $MSFT which can greate hype over their great products from day one although it just in development. 
Very bullish excited to see who will lead us to a successfull future. This technology and patents is worth in my eyes at least a triple digit market cap and this already now. And in the near future a four digit market cap.
